page.title: 14BOURNEMOUTH WEATHER STATION
page.content: SITUATED IN KING'S PARK NEAR POKESDOWN STATION IN BOURNEMOUTH IS THE WEATHER STATION WHICH RECORDS THE WEATHER AND THE HOURS OF SUNSHINE OF THE BOURNEMOUTH DISTRICT. THE STATION HAS RECENTLY MOVED FROM HURN AIRPORT TO A POSITION WHICH BENEFITS FROM MORE SUNSHINE. MR PETER ROGERS RECORDS THE WEATHER ON A REGULAR BASIS AND HAS MANY CONTACTS WITH LOCAL SCHOOLS. HE RECENTLY GAVE A SERIES OF LESSONS AT KING'S PARK AND ST. JAMES' C.E. SCHOOLS. IN THE PARK THE SUNSHINE TOWER IS A NOTED LANDMARK ALTHOUGH IT IS UNFORTUNATELY THE TARGET FOR VANDALS. MR ROGERS HAS LOST SEVEN PIECES OF SUNSHINE EQUIPMENT THIS YEAR ALONE.
